title: Enhancing Healthcare Practical Competencies: Location-Based Mobile Mathematics Terminology Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical terminology comprehension and fundamental smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can understand math terminology provided three times daily via location-based push notifications with 80% accuracy
Learners can explain at least three context-specific application cases of math terminology presented in real-life spaces (offices, commuting routes, etc.)
Learners record satisfaction scores of 4.0 or higher (on a 5-point scale) for location-based learning functions after completing the one-week program

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
